    • Method Detail

      • getInstrumentsAllocation

        public java.util.List<AtelierInstrumentsService.PersonInstrumentRow> getInstrumentsAllocation(Action action)
                                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: AtelierInstrumentsService
        Retrieve instruments allocation, for a workshop action. The allocation is a list of pair (person, instrument) called rows. The implementation should make sure it returns a row for each participant of the workshop.
        Specified by:
        getInstrumentsAllocation in interface AtelierInstrumentsService
        Parameters:
        action - the action of the workshop
        Returns:
        the allocation of instrument played by participant
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
